info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 8 at 12:46PM PDT until July 9 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko NV
info.description:
...RED FLAG WARNING TODAY FOR ZONES 425, 426 & 427/ RED FLAG WARNING WEDNESDAY FOR ZONES 424, 425, 427, 438, 469 AND 470...
The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM PDT Wednesday.
* Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 427 Central Nevada-Toiyabe.
* WIND...Sustained west to southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 30 to 40 mph.
* HUMIDITY...Afternoon relative humidity values of 5% to 10%
* IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 426 AND 427... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM PDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 427
